privacyPolicyDescription: Learn how Mini Notepad protects your privacy and handles your data. We are committed to local-first storage and maximum user privacy protection.
termsOfServiceDescription: Please read our terms of service before using Mini Notepad. Understand your rights and responsibilities, as well as our service scope.
privacySection1Content:
Mini Notepad follows a local-first design philosophy to maximize your privacy protection:

  • No personal information collection: We don't require you to provide names, emails, or any personal information
  • No tracking technology: We don't use third-party analytics, ad tracking, or user behavior analysis
  • No browsing history storage: Your visit history and usage patterns are not recorded
  • Technical data only: We only temporarily store note content and sharing settings when you actively choose to share notes
privacySection2Content:
Your note data is completely stored on your local device:

  • Local storage: All notes are saved in your browser's local storage by default, which we cannot access
  • Temporary cloud storage: Content is only uploaded to our servers when you actively choose to share notes
  • Automatic deletion: When you cancel sharing, related data is immediately deleted from our servers
  • Encrypted transmission: All data transmission is protected using HTTPS encryption protocols
privacySection3Content:
We maintain strict limitations on data sharing:

  • No data sales: We will never sell your personal information or note content to third parties
  • No commercial use: Your note content is only used to provide sharing services, not for any commercial purposes
  • Legal requirements: We will not disclose your information to any third party unless explicitly required by law
  • Service providers: The cloud service providers we use all follow strict data protection standards
privacySection4Content:
You have complete control over your data:

  • Access rights: You can view and access all locally stored note data at any time
  • Deletion rights: You can delete local notes or cancel cloud sharing at any time
  • Export rights: You can export notes in Markdown or text format at any time
  • Control rights: You can choose whether to share notes and when to stop sharing
privacySection5Content:
If you have any questions or suggestions about our privacy policy, please contact us through:

  • GitHub: Submit an issue in our open source project
  • Email: Through the contact email in the project description

We will respond to your inquiries as soon as possible after receiving them.
termsSection1Content:
Mini Notepad is a free online notepad service designed to provide users with a simple, fast, and secure note-taking experience:

  • Service scope: Provides online text editing, local storage, and cloud sharing functionality
  • Technical support: Supports Markdown syntax, theme switching, and multilingual interface
  • Free commitment: We promise to provide core functions permanently free, with no hidden charges
  • Open source project: This project uses an open source license, with transparent and auditable code
termsSection2Content:
When using our service, you need to bear the following responsibilities:

  • Content responsibility: You bear full responsibility for the note content you create and share
  • Lawful use: You may not use this service to create, store, or share illegal or non-compliant content
  • Respect others: You may not infringe on others' intellectual property, privacy rights, or other legitimate rights
  • Secure use: Properly protect your sharing links and avoid leaking sensitive information
  • No abuse: You may not use technical means to attack or interfere with normal service operation
termsSection3Content:
We strive to provide stable and reliable service, but you need to understand the following limitations:

  • Service availability: We do not guarantee 100% service availability and may temporarily interrupt service due to maintenance, upgrades, etc.
  • Data security: Although we take reasonable security measures, we cannot guarantee absolute data security
  • Content review: We do not actively review user content but reserve the right to delete illegal content
  • Liability limitation: To the extent permitted by law, we are not liable for losses caused by using this service
termsSection4Content:
If you have any disputes or opinions about our service:

  • Amicable negotiation: We recommend first resolving disputes through amicable negotiation
  • Contact methods: You can contact us through GitHub or email
  • Applicable law: The interpretation and dispute resolution of these terms are subject to relevant local laws and regulations
  • Terms changes: We reserve the right to modify these terms, and significant changes will be notified in advance

defaultNote.title: Welcome to Mini Notepad
defaultNote.content:
# Welcome to Mini Notepad! 🎉

Thanks for trying out our simple, fast, and secure notepad. Here's what you can do:

## ✨ Key Features

- **Offline First**: Your notes work without internet
- **Markdown Support**: Format your text with Markdown
- **Privacy Focused**: Data stays on your device by default
- **Share When Needed**: Generate links to share notes
- **Dark Mode**: Easy on your eyes

## 🚀 Getting Started

1. Start typing to replace this content
2. Your changes are automatically saved
3. Use the toolbar for formatting options
4. Click the share button to share with others

## 💾 Storage Options

**Not signed in?** Your notes are saved locally on this device.
**Want to sync?** Sign in to save notes to the cloud and access them anywhere.

---

*This is your space - make it yours! Start writing below or create a new note.*
